description.summary: pythonic binding for the libxml2 and libxslt libraries
description.p: lxml is a new Python binding for libxml2 and libxslt, completely independent from existing Python bindings. Its aim:

ul.li: Use Python unicode strings in API.

description.p: lxml aims to provide a Pythonic API by following as much as possible the ElementTree API, trying to avoid inventing too many new APIs, or the user's having to learn new things -- XML is complicated enough.
